title: What is the saddest death animation ?
body: For me it's {{champion:35}}  , i mean that scream just tears my heart apart :'(

replies.body:
{{champion:96}} 

HE FUCKING EXPLODES WHAT IS WORSE THAN THAT!!!
no creature that cute deserves such a terrible death.

Clowns are evil and deserve to die.

For me, it's probably {{champion:236}}. The way he calls his wife's name with his dying breath is the perfect amount of grim and touching.

Most shocking probably goes to {{champion:89}}. She sounds like she's in so much agony.

{{champion:117}} has always seemed sad to me, the way she just goes Poof and then her hat floats down, it makes me feel like she's vanished forever.

{{champion:432}} is really sad to, it actually reminds me of Yoda's or Obi Wan Kenobi's deaths, because he just dissapears from inside his garments, and those are two of the saddest deaths in Movies in my opinion.

{{champion:23}} could almost be really sad, how he gets impaled by his own sword and all, but I have to say he's so annoying to play against that I just get really satisfied when I see it.

{{champion:57}} is actually really sad if you watch the whole thing (it's surprisingly long) but after he dies an falls over, his sapling runs all over him like it's trying to save him or see if he's alive, and then jumps to the ground and falls over dead as well. it's pretty heart wrenching once you realize what it's doing.
+1 for Star Wars ref. I have always been a fan of the empire/sith (judge all you want) however I still respect Yoda and Kenobi for the Jedi Knights they are.
{{champion:23}} has a death animation? But that would require him to die... is that even possible?

{{champion:432}}  The way his..w/e being just vanishes and his vessel falls lifelessly to the ground
{{champion:15}}  Reaching for her boomerang blade thing struggling to survive but doesn't make it
{{champion:254}}  Cause she's my waifu and I dun like my waifu dying
{{champion:222}} Backup waifu
teemo
I am imagining you hiding in a bunker waiting for the shitstorm xDD
Every teemo death the a glorious and a marvelous event
Umm... {{champion:113}}  Poro rider? A poro dying is not the saddest possible thing?
{{champion:68}} He flys up and smashes the ground most likely breaking all of his bones upon impact, and that is what kills him to me. I do love the "WEEEEEEE" sound he does, though.
{{champion:69}}  Definitely takes the cake here.. that scream sounds like she is in complete agony not to mention she crumbles into pieces... poor Cass...

{{champion:2}}, specifically Brolaf.

"Your mom!"

It's sad when someone's last words are so crude and unintelligent.

I'd have to say {{champion:37}} has the saddest death animation. She can't even cry out or scream; she just...floats silently to her death.

{{champion:39}} gets a special mention for the sheer brutality of hers. That bloodcurdling scream she lets out as her own weapon murders her is pretty neato.

{{champion:39}}  is even more crazy once you read her lore and learn that the blades belonged to her father.

She gets killed by her father's magical spirit blades.

{{champion:238}} H... Wait, he doesn't even die.


Ok, now seriously i vote for {{champion:67}} , yeah, it's not the most saddest in general, but i feel bad for her when se tries to shot her enemy until no forces exist no more and colapses to the ground.
Check out Irelia's death animation. It's pretty brutal.

Two that haven't been mentioned yet, for your consideration...

{{champion:59}} and human-form {{champion:102}} are both pretty sad, simply because they take *so long* to die.  Neither wants to go down or stay down, with Jarvan struggling to stand back up and Shyvana dropping her gauntlets and trying to crawl away.  It's not as brutal as others (Irelia, Corki) but it hammers home the fact that both of them are trying to defy death and carry on, but they just don't have anything left.

HE SPILLS ALL HIS FREAKING WINE WHEN HE DIES!!! {{champion:79}} 

"The only time I have a drinking problem is when I spill it" - Gragas

> [{quoted}](name=do u realy care,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=LXwZ1G4v,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-13T09:43:39.059+0000)
>
> For me it's {{champion:35}}  , i mean that scream just tears my heart apart :'(

I want to agree with you because I play a lot of Shaco, but his death scream is also his clone's. I love it when the clone explodes.
For you. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vjVQGw5EIPc
{{champion:45}}  Just drops dead without saying a single word.  Silent but heartbreaking to say the least.
The silent ones are often the saddest.{{champion:37}}

{{champion:119}} because of the Cowboy Bebop reference.

"...Bang..."
YESSSS! I wish he said it though..
I could have sworn he did, although I've never played him myself.
Naw he just makes choking sounds :(

{{champion:39}}  is up there for sure
{{champion:57}} the sapling makes it so sad 
{{champion:23}} cmon now thats just brutal
{{champion:59}} he tries soo hard to make it through but he never does
{{champion:1}}  little girl reaches for her teddy bear, but never reaches it! T.T

{{champion:7}} **SO DRAMATIC**
{{champion:115}} the string of "no" before he accidentally commits suicide
{{champion:39}} Her own weapon betraying and impaling her all as she desperately tries to stop it.

Diana cause she screams in agony and just disappears alone lying on the ground wondering why but my Leona screaming and putting her hand up to her adc like get em for me  then falling into a pile of light {{champion:131}} {{champion:89}}

I refer you to my old ass thread:

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3821814

{{champion:14}} That death scream when you finally put him down just makes me feel for him. He has so much unfinished business when he dies... like punching more people in the face. But he just runs out... he slumps over and then lets out one final yell of frustration before he just lies back and dies.

{{champion:117}} so whimsical, so innocent... and then just one surprised scream and all that's left is her hat. That scream makes me feel that she has no idea that she can die until hit happens.
{{champion:6}} The bastard drowns in the puddle of his own blood knowing he'll suffer the same fate until the end of time. "Eternal Life, endless torture."

{{champion:37}}  not even a scream, she just holds her ethwal and silently floats to the ground

{{champion:67}} /{{champion:59}}  they both try to keep going on but it's too much for them and they collapse 

{{champion:39}}  she gets murdered by her own freaking blades, talk about brutal 

{{champion:1}}  support or mid, she's a pain to go against but when she dies she coughs and calls to tibbers, tibbers trying to reach him but dies before she can...

{{champion:201}}  i personally find it hilarious as he dies, he tries to get up but his shield falls on him and forcing his legs back up

{{champion:29}} that scream always gets me, as he twirls in the air and breaks his neck(or spine) and breaks his cross bow too

I will not say that {{champion:101}}'s is sad, however it is just. He spent his time in prison absorbing power which turned him into pure energy. What other end is there besides exploding because of the power inside you?

Basically I respect {{champion:101}} because he tried to gain as much power as he could to the point where he died from not being able to control it. Its like owning a pet tiger that eats you alive. There is no better death than that.
Cassiopea's pretty bad, so is Wukong. I also kinda feel bad for Xerath, since he just, well, explodes - at least Kog'Maw can do something productive with his explosive death.
{{champion:59}} , since he tries SO hard to get up and keep fighting, but his limbs just give out underneath his weight. Good night, sweet prince :(
{{champion:39}}

while {{champion:39}}  is probably one of the top 3#
Id say a lot of people are forgetting {{champion:110}} where its a very similar reaction.
{{champion:236}}  also deserves a very high spot. While the animation itself isnt anything spectacular, his final death cries of his wife definitely ranks him as my other top 3
{{champion:23}}'s  is sad. His sword kind of falls right into his chest. I don't think h has a chance of getting up from dat one.
{{champion:119}}
{{champion:267}} There's one death she has where she gasps and then makes this grunting sound like she's trying to keep going but can't and so she lets out her last breath. :(

So nobody's going to say {{champion:32}} ?

Shame on you all.
Riven. She just refuses to die.
Zac has a pretty sad death animation.  He just slowly melts down into a puddle of goo...

{{champion:7}} 

She dies so dramatically and so calmly :'(
